violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or adjust zones.

violations.description: Persons nearby without green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange badges.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all persons have required access badges.

violations.description: Unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.
All persons in work zones must wear required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Inspect all persons for required PPE.

report.summary: The scene observation is non-compliant with several security rules. Please review the rule descriptions and recommendations to address the issues.
